name: Who may vote by absentee ballot
text: Any person registered to vote may cast an absentee ballot in the manner provided in this chapter and rules adopted by the chief election officer. [L 1975, c 36, pt of §3; am L 1980, c 248, §1(a); am L 1981, c 29, §1(1); am L 1984, c 149, §1; gen ch 1985; am L 1993, c 230, §2]
